name: Correct the errors in the code
instruction:
The function `stopAt10Element` takes 3 parameters:

* An empty array `arr`

* Initial value `num1` - this is the number from which the array filling starts.

* Final value `num2` - this is the number with which the array filling ends.

The initial value will always be less than the final value.

The array is filled with numbers from the initial value to the final value inclusive.

Array filling is interrupted at the 10th element.

The function returns the filled array.

Fix the errors in the code to make it comply with the task conditions.
